circle



Circle2f

typedef struct {
  vec2f center;
  float radius;
} Circle2f;
type: C struct
description: circle 2d - float

Circle2d

typedef struct {
  vec2d  center;
  double radius;
} Circle2d;
type: C struct
description: circle 2d - double

Circlef

typedef struct {
  vec3f center;
  float radius;
} Circlef;
type: C struct
description: circle - float

Circled

typedef struct {
  vec3d  center;
  double radius;
} Circled;
type: C struct
description: circle - double

m_circle_pointd

void m_circle_pointd(double *circle, double theta, double *res);
type: C function
description: get point (vec3) from circle at angle theta (between 0 and 2 pi)

m_circle2_pointd

void m_circle2_pointd(double *circle, double theta, double *res);
type: C function
description: get point (vec2) from circle 2d at angle theta (between 0 and 2 pi)

m_circle2_contains_pointd

bool m_circle2_contains_pointd(double *circle, double *point);
type: C function
description: check circle 2d contains point (vec2)

m_circle2_intersectsd

bool m_circle2_intersectsd(double *a, double *b);
type: C function
description: check if two 2d circles intersect

m_circle2_overlapsd

bool m_circle2_overlapsd(double *a, double *b);
type: C function
description: check if two 2d circles overlap
